danish: Private virksomheder bør stå for en større del af hjemmehjælpen til ældre
english: Private companies should account for a greater part of the care for the elderly

danish: Kommunen skal inddrage frivilligt arbejde på plejehjem ​for at aflaste personalet
english: The municipality must involve voluntary work in nursing homes to relieve the staff

danish: Kommuneskatten skal sænkes
english: Municipal tax should be lowered

danish: Virksomheder skal betale færre afgifter til kommunen
english: Companies must pay less taxes to the municipality

danish: Det er muligt at spare penge i kommunen uden at det går ud over velfærden
english: It is possible to save money in the municipality without compromising welfare

danish: Kommunen skal sikre, at folkeskoleklasserne er bredt socialt sammensatte
english: The municipality must ensure that the primary school classes are broadly socially composed

danish: Der skal være en fast grænse for, hvor mange børn der må være pr pædagog i børnehaver og vuggestuer
english: There must be a fixed limit for how many children there are per childcare worker in kindergartens

danish: Kommunen skal bruge flere penge på forbedring af veje
english: The municipality should spend more on road improvement

danish: Kommunen skal bruge flere penge på cykelstier
english: The municipality should spend more on cycle paths

danish: Kommunen kan modtage flere flygtninge
english: The municipality can receive more refugees

danish: Kommunale institutioner tager for mange hensyn til religiøse minoriteter
english: Municipal institutions have too many considerations for religious minorities

danish: Der anvendes for mange penge på biblioteker og kulturhuse
english: Too much money is spent on libraries and cultural centers

danish: Kommunen skal betale for børns idrætsaktiviteter​, hvis forældrene ikke har råd​
english: The municipality has to pay for children's sports activities if parents can not afford it

danish: Ældre der har råd, skal kunne tilvælge og betale for ekstra service på de kommunale plejehjem
english: Older people who can afford it, should be able to opt and pay for extra services at the municipal nursing homes

danish: Kommunen skal sikre mere sortering og genanvendelse af borgernes affald
english: The municipality must ensure more sorting and recycling of municipal waste

danish: Kommunen skal gøre mere for at skabe sammenhængende ​naturområder
english: The municipality must do more to create cohesive natural areas

danish: Kommunen skal hjælpe borgere til at stoppe med at ryge
english: The municipality must help citizens to stop smoking

danish: Salg af alkohol i idrætshaller skal være forbudt
english: The sale of alcohol in sports venues must be prohibited

danish: Kommunen skal prioritere at købe strøm fra vindmøller
english: The municipality must give priority to purchasing wind power

danish: Det er en fordel at indkøbsmuligheder samles i storcentre​
english: It is a good thing that shops are concentrated in malls

danish: Kommunen skal stille større krav til arbejdsløse
english: The municipality must demand more of the unemployed

danish: Børn går for mange timer i skole
english: Children have too many hours of school

danish: Der bør kun serveres økologisk mad i offentlige madordninger
english: Food made by the public institutions should always be organic

danish: Kommunens biler skal køre på el
english: The municipality's cars should run on electricity

danish: Der bør ansættes flere i hjemmeplejen
english: More people should be hired to care for the elderly
